/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The buildings are adorned with balconies and awnings, hinting at the architectural style of the area. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the colorful buildings. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is captured during the day, under bright sunlight, which illuminates the scene and brings out the details of the buildings and the street.
